short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the wisdom and beauty of the Quran with a simple click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension generates a random verse from the Holy Quran each time you use it, offering a fresh perspective and spiritual encouragement.
